content.raw:
I actually just configured it for ign-math based on an example submitted by @traversaro 

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/87/add-appveyor-configuration-for-windows/diff

The main advantage is that appveyor is already integrated with bitbucket's build status API (look at the green checkmark on that page!). Also, it builds every commit, and it's free, so I think it's not a bad idea. We can still prioritize jenkins, but use appveyor too when it is easy to do so.
